column1: Bioanalytical Chemistry and Pharmaceutical Analysis MSc
column5: YOUR BIOANALYTICAL CHEMISTRY AND PHARMACEUTICAL ANALYSIS (M.SC.) FULL-TIME MASTER’S PROGRAMAnalytical science is becoming increasingly significant: Fast and precise analytical methods are more important than ever in research, quality control, and production monitoring. At Hochschule Fresenius, you can study Bioanalytical Chemistry and Pharmaceutical Analysis (M.Sc.) in just two full-time semesters. Gain professional knowledge of modern analytical methods and the correct classification of the results these methods deliver.YOU’D RATHER STUDY PART-TIME?
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
